name: la Llorona
summary: A sprectral 'wailing woman' in Spanish she haunts river and ditch banks searching for the children she drowned in madness.
description: A sprectral 'wailing woman' in Spanish she haunts river and ditch banks searching for the children she drowned in madness after her husband spurned her.
location: found along rivers and ditches thoughout the Spanish speaking regions of the Americas.
